participant_1.background:

i m obsessed with animals.
this summer i went on vacation to italy.
My favorite websites are Healthline and Eat This, Not That! because they provide evidence-based information about nutrition and healthy recipes.
during the week , i work as a barista.

i go to a private high school.
I am not a big sports fan, I prefer to spend my time with my dog and my job.
I like mangoes because they are sweet and juicy.
I've been working with my parents for as long as I can remember.

content.text: My day is going well, thanks for asking! I'm just a bit tired from working so many hours at the food pantry.
Oh that's tough, but it's really great that you're doing that. I'm sure it's a lot of work, but it's important work.
Thanks, I really appreciate that. It is a lot of work, but it's also really rewarding. I like being able to help people in need.
That's great to hear. What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love spending time with my dog, and I also like to work on my art.
Oh that's awesome. I love art too. What kind of art do you do?
I mostly paint, but I also do some drawing and sculpture.
That's so cool. I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's really not that hard. You just have to have a little patience and practice.
Maybe I'll try it out sometime. I'm sure it would be fun.
I think you'd be great at it
